name: item-filter-code
description: Support for editing Path of Exile item filters within Visual Studio Code.
author: Glen Marker

scripts.vscode:prepublish: run-s clean build:schemas build:data build:code:release lint:* test

item-filter.baseWhitelist.title: Item Base Whitelist
item-filter.baseWhitelist.description: Additional item bases considered to be valid within item filters.

item-filter.classWhitelist.title: Item Class Whitelist
item-filter.classWhitelist.description: Additional item classes considered to be valid within item filters.

item-filter.prophecyWhitelist.title: Prophecy Whitelist
item-filter.prophecyWhitelist.description: Additional prophecies considered to be valid within item filters.

item-filter.ruleWhitelist.title: Rule Whitelist
item-filter.ruleWhitelist.description: Additional keywords considered to be valid block rules within item filters.

item-filter.soundWhitelist.title: Sound Whitelist
item-filter.soundWhitelist.description: Additional sound identifiers considered to be valid within item filters.

item-filter.modWhitelist.title: Item Mod Whitelist
item-filter.modWhitelist.description: Additional explicit item mods considered to be valid for the HasExplicitMod rule.

item-filter.performanceHints.title: Performance Hints
item-filter.performanceHints.description: Whether to display performance hints within the editor.

item-filter.itemValueQuotes.title: Item Value Quotes
item-filter.itemValueQuotes.description: When selecting suggested string values for the Class and BaseType rules, always surround the value with quotation marks.

item-filter.booleanQuotes.title: Boolean Value Quotes
item-filter.booleanQuotes.description: When selecting a suggested value for boolean rules, such as Corrupted, always surround the value with quotation marks.

item-filter.rarityQuotes.title: Rarity Value Quotes
item-filter.rarityQuotes.description: When selecting a suggested value for the Rarity rule, always surround the value with quotation marks.

item-filter.modQuotes.title: Mod Value Quotes
item-filter.modQuotes.description: When selecting a suggested value for the HasExplicitMod rule, always surround the value with quotation marks.

item-filter.linuxMPGAvailable.title: Linux MPG Availability
item-filter.linuxMPGAvailable.description: Set this to true to indicate that you have installed mpg123 onto your system and that it is available within your PATH environment variable.

item-filter.linuxMPGPath.title: Linux MPG Path
item-filter.linuxMPGPath.description: The full path to the mpg123 binary on your system. You should include the file name of the binary as well in order for this to work properly.

item-filter.verifyCustomSounds.title: Verify Custom Alert Sounds
item-filter.verifyCustomSounds.description: Whether to validate the existence of all files provided as the value to CustomAlertSound rules. Only applicable when using Windows.

item-filter.windowsDocumentFolder.title: Windows User Document Folder
item-filter.windowsDocumentFolder.description: The full path to your Documents folder.
